titles.title: Strengthening Local Coronavirus Response Act
Strengthening Local Coronavirus Response Act
A bill to require States to pass-through 45 percent of the amounts paid from the Coronavirus Relief Fund to local governments that did not receive a direct payment from the Fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
